uc.supergradient.preset2: Increases the height of pinned tabs (Disabled when tab bar not expanded)
uc.supergradient.preset3: Decreases the gap between pinned tabs
uc.supergradient.preset4: Only shows loaded tabs when the tab bar is collapsed
uc.supergradient.preset5: Only shows loaded tabs when the tab bar is collapsed, except when hovering over them (Only works with the above option enabled!)
uc.supergradient.brighten: Makes the colors of pinned tabs pop more
uc.supergradient.desaturate: Disables the background color of pinned tabs
uc.supergradient.use-accent-color: Uses Zen's accent colors (e.g. on tabs, set in Zen's Look and Feel setting) instead of accent colors optimized for the gradient
uc.supergradient.switch-colors: Switches the colors of the gradient
